title: RNLI is first major charity to give supporters control over contact (RNLI - Royal National ...
text: ( Source : RNLI - Royal National Lifeboat Institution ) The RNLI is the first major UK charity to announce a fundamental change to the way it contacts people. From 1 January 2017 it will only contact individuals who have expressly given their
